content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-02-12 #21804 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.

This unfortunately has three new maxHeartbeats. I don't really understand what could be in this nightly to cause a slow-down. Leo changed how simp +arith works, but as far as I can tell aesop_cat shouldn't be calling that.
I'd like to get the timing of those three declarations on master.

Kim Morrison said:

as far as I can tell aesop_cat should be calling that.

"shouldn't"?
I'm just going to merge this, the maxHeartbeats will join our backlog.
I did check --- sadly these were around 50,000 heartbeats previously so this is a significant slow down.
I find it jarring that the doc-string comes after #adaptation_note, btw. That is really not how comments are meant to work.
